Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 1 (Health Unit) -- 2 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Red River, State of Louisiana, levy a two (2) mill tax on all of the property subject to taxation in said Parish (an estimated $472,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of operation and maintenance of the Red River Parish Health Unit?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 2 (Public Facilities) -- 3 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Red River, State of Louisiana, levy a three (3) mill tax on all of the property subject to taxation in said Parish (an estimated $708,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of operation, preserving and maintaining the public physical facilities owned by the Parish of Red River?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Board Prop. No. 1 -- 5.62 Mills Continuation - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School Board Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the Red River Parish School Board, Parish of Red River, Louisiana, be authorized to levy and collect a special tax of five and sixty-two hundredths (5.62) mills on all property subject to taxation within the Parish of Red River, State of Louisiana (the "Parish") (an estimated $1,313,822 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of giving additional aid to the public schools of the Parish, said millage to represent a fifty-seven hundredths of a mill (.57) increase (due to reappraisal) over the 5.05 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2017 pursuant to an election held on March 31, 2007?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Board Prop. No. 2 (PW Sch. Dist. No. 1) -- $29.5M Bond - SB - 20 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School Board Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Bond)
Race.FullText: Shall Parishwide School District No. 1 of the Parish of Red River, State of Louisiana, incur debt and issue bonds to the amount of not exceeding $29,500,000, to run not exceeding 20 years from date thereof, with interest at a rate or rates not exceeding 7% per annum, for the purpose of acquiring and/or improving lands for building sites and playgrounds, including construction of necessary sidewalks and streets adjacent thereto; purchasing, erecting and/or improving school buildings and other school related facilities within and for the District and acquiring the necessary equipment and furnishings therefor, title to which shall be in the public; which bonds will be general obligations of the District and will be payable from ad valorem taxes to be levied and collected in the manner provided by Article VI, Section 33 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974 and statutory authority supplemental thereto, with an estimated 9.60 mills to be levied in the first year of issue to pay said Bonds?
